name: superiority
content:
superiority noun [U]
(BETTER)
Add to word list
Add to word list
C2 the fact that one person or thing is better, stronger, etc. than another: The Australian team soon demonstrated their superiority over the opposition. Compare
inferiority
C2 an unpleasant way of behaving that a person has when they think they are better than other people: Her sense of superiority makes her very unpopular.

superiority noun [U]
(HIGHER)
the state of being of a higher rank or social position than others

Add to word list
the quality of being better than average, or better than others of the same type: Advertisements are designed to show the superiority of one product over its competitors.
